description:
If you have ever wanted to start a part time business from home but didn't know where to begin, this course is for you. I will show you step-by-step how to start an online business based on your passion, interest, skills, knowledge or experience.

  • Learn how to test your ideas for marketability.
  • Learn about free tech tools to help you run your online business.
  • Learn the keys to creating products and services that people want to buy.
  • Learn how to set up a free website.
  • Learn how to drive free traffic to your site.
  • Learn about easy to use product creation tools.
  • Learn proven strategies to grow your business.
  • And much, much, more.

18 short video lectures will guide you step-by-step. Each lecture is accompanied by a set of lecture notes that summarizes each lesson. Nothing is left out.

In short, you will learn everything you need to start and grow a profitable online business that you love; without quitting your job or taking a financial risk.
title: Start Small - Grow Big
